channel.title: Glass on Kai Kunze
channel.description: Recent content in Glass on Kai Kunze
channel.item: Hacking Glass <<<<<<< HEAD https://kaikunze.de/2013/12/22/hacking-glass/ Sun, 22 Dec 2013 00:00:00 +0000 https://kaikunze.de/2013/12/22/hacking-glass/ ======= http://localhost:1313/2013/12/22/hacking-glass/ Sun, 22 Dec 2013 00:00:00 +0000 http://localhost:1313/2013/12/22/hacking-glass/ >>>>>>> f0c6135 (refactor for hugo changes) So I got my hands on another Glass device and can now play with it a bit longer.

A Week with Glass <<<<<<< HEAD https://kaikunze.de/2013/09/20/a-week-with-glass/ Fri, 20 Sep 2013 00:00:00 +0000 https://kaikunze.de/2013/09/20/a-week-with-glass/ ======= http://localhost:1313/2013/09/20/a-week-with-glass/ Fri, 20 Sep 2013 00:00:00 +0000 http://localhost:1313/2013/09/20/a-week-with-glass/ >>>>>>> f0c6135 (refactor for hugo changes) How my grandparents interact with GLASS, showed me that Google seems to be onto something.
